Commentary.ab: Y26.2b vərəzi.dōiϑranąm] varəzi° well attested, but cf. vərəzi.saōka-, vərəzi.sauuah-, etc.
Y26.2d aiϑiiejaŋhō] sec. cod.; Geldner, Kellens aiϑiiajaŋhō.

Parallels.ab: aṣ̌āunąm vaŋuhīš sūrā̊ spəṇtā̊ frauuaṣ̌aiiō = Y2.19, Y6.20, Y17.19, Y26.9, Y59.19, Y66.24, Y71.23, VrS14.7, VrS81.29, Yt13 (passim), Šn. ext. ardafrawahr.

aməṣ̌anąm spəṇtanąm ... bərəzatąm ... yōi aiϑiiejaŋhō aṣ̌auuanō ~ Y1.11, Y3.13, Y4.16, Y7.14, Y22.14, Y24.21, Y66.1, VrS78.23, VrS79.16, VrS82.11 ahuraēibiia miϑraēibiia bərəzaṇbiia aiϑiiejaŋhaēibiia aṣ̌auuanaēibiia; Y2.11, Y6.10, Y59.10, VrS81.10, VVrS14.9 ~ ahura miϑra bərəzaṇta aiϑiiejaŋha aṣ̌auuana.
